body: If it was me i would have skipped school right after hearing the news in school, aiming for expulsion. If it isnt a national bill then i would sue that school for all its got and get my schoolmates to boycott them. If it is a national bill however, i'll disappear off the map and live out the rest of my life cross dressing while working for a job that doesnt ask for personal documents. And if it was my parents who passes that bill i would happily end them.

I'm guessing this is some shit about fixing Japan's ( ( LOW BIRTHRATE ) ) by allowing old dudes rape school girls. And the ending had a twist where the main girl that getting raped's Mom was the one that passed the bill(?)
